user.title: H.A WordPlay Setup
user.description:
Configure your WordPlay game with a long-lived access token.

**Step 1:** Go to [Profile → Security]({token_url}) in Home Assistant
**Step 2:** Create a new Long-lived access token
**Step 3:** Copy and paste the token below
**Step 4:** Choose your preferred game difficulty and audio settings

stats_overview.title: Game Statistics Overview

stats_selection.title: Select Users for Stats Reset
stats_selection.description:
Choose which users' statistics you want to reset:

⚠️ **Warning**: This will permanently delete all game data including:
• Games played and won
• Win streaks and records
• Guess distribution data
• Play time statistics
• All difficulty-specific stats

This action cannot be undone!

stats_confirmation.title: ⚠️ Final Confirmation - Reset Statistics
stats_confirmation.description:
**You are about to reset statistics for:**

{users_to_reset}

**{warning}**

All game data will be permanently deleted including games played, wins, streaks, and records.

Are you absolutely sure you want to proceed?
